title: Avail 9/1 JP Stonybrook 2BD/1.5BA Townhouse w/Laundry, Deck & Parking
posting_body: Available September 1 - This townhouse is located in the heart of Jamaica Plain, right next to Stonybrook Station on the Orange line.

The apartment features hardwood floors throughout, updated kitchen with granite counter tops and dishwasher, separate living room and dining room, and two equal sized bedrooms on the second floor with a full bath.
There is a half bath on the first floor as well as a private deck that leads out to your off street parking spot.
There is a private basement that has your own washer/dryer and extra storage space.
The home has also recently been fully insulated and has replacement windows to help save you money on your utility bills.
The location is tough to beat with the Southwest Corridor park in your back yard, and all the amenities of Centre St just moments away.
To schedule a time to view this apartment or others of a similar nature call/text/email Rob. Cheers!
FIRST, SECURITY, BROKER FEE DUE/1 YEAR LEASE.
